text:
Édouard Marquis (17 August 1969 – 23 November 2020) was a French radio and television host, journalist, and producer. He was born in Paris. Marquis produced reports for France 2, Télé emploi, France 5, and MCM.
Marquis died on 23 November 2020 in Montluçon, France from a long-illness at the age of 51.
